name: Good Ruler V 0.0.0
description:
Hello everyone!

This is the first game that i've made and the name is good ruler

It's a strategy turn based game where you play as a ruler who just got the control over a city in the middle ages, you can tax your people, order to build structures in order to create resources and sell/buy resources.

I will update the game weekly and make it better each time

make sure to download the game and let me know about your suggestions to make this game better, i really appreciate it.
